about_the_game:
Get your trigger fingers ready, because Moorhuhn VR Blast takes the chaotic, chicken-blasting action to a whole new dimension! Dive into the crazy world of the iconic Moorhuhn franchise, now fully reimagined for VR, and experience the ultimate test of speed, accuracy, and just how much fun it is to shoot at zany, unpredictable chickens!

Moorhuhn VR Blast is a faithful modernization of the classic arcade game, designed from the ground up for VR. Whether you’re a seasoned gamer or a total noob, you’ll feel right at home with intuitive controls and smooth, comfortable gameplay. Moorhuhn VR Blast is the ultimate VR shoot-em-up! 

Whether you're looking to blow off steam or compete for the top, Moorhuhn VR Blast offers the perfect mix of nostalgia and cutting-edge VR gameplay.

So grab your headset, lock and load, and prepare for a chicken hunt like no other. These Moorhuhns aren’t gonna blast themselves!

Blast Away!

Easy to learn but hard to master! Grab your weapon and try to hit as many moorhuhn as you possibly can to reach the top of the board and unlock awesome rewards!

Dodge those eggs!

Life's not only shoot and chill. The moorhuhn will try and fight back by throwing eggs in your face. Shoot the eggs for extra points, dodge them or be hit and covered in yolk! 

Multiple Weapons to unlock

From trusty shotguns to high-tech lasers, each weapon adds a unique feel to your playthrough. Unlock them by succeeding time trials!

Variety of iconic levels

Play through recognizable locations that are inspired by past Moorhuhn titles. Each level has its own vibe, secrets and playstyle. Pay attention to the moorhuhn as they like to change clothes depending on the environment.

Arcade & Endless

  • Arcade Mode: The classic Moorhuhn experience—fast-paced, score-focused, and endlessly addictive.

  • Endless Survival: How long can you last as the chickens just keep coming? Dodge those eggs or else it's game over!

Interactive Environments

Use the environment to your advantage to increase your score. Fire at barrels to make them explode, hitting all chickens around it. Shoot at locks to release more valuable moorhuhns and find secret upgrade boxes to gain temporary bonuses!

Power-ups Galore

Instantly reload or gain temporary powerful weapons to turn the tide in your favor. Each upgrade feels like a reward and gives you more oppertunities to increase your score!

Cheats and Costumes

Alter your playthrough with funny cheats and costumes. These game changing settings can be unlocked by earning score throughout the different levels. Costumes will dress the moorhuhn up regardless the level you play. Cheats will drastically alter your gameplay by enlarging the moorhuhn, making your bullets explode or remove the need to reload.

Prove you’re the top chicken chaser with global high scores. Each level and game mode has its own leaderboard to compete. Focus on your favourite level or spread your chances. Compare your score with that of your friends and beat them to the punch!

Join our community on discord and have a real impact on the support of the game. We actively converse with members, hold design contests and  keep members up-to-date on new game announcements, releases and giveaways!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB/1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 6700 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Get ready to blast some chickens like no other with “Moorhuhn VR Blast!” Feel the arcade vibe as you enter Moorhuhn in Virtual Reality. Test your arcade shooting skills in a variety of all the classic levels you know and love. Every level offers new challenges and new weapons to unlock.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
